entry.title: Developer documentation on bitcoin.org
entry.summary: Sa√Øvann Carignan has informed the bitcoin community that a new "Developer Documentation" section will soon be added on bitcoin.org. The documentation aims to provide thorough technical knowledge to developers. A live preview of the section is available at bitcoindev.us.to, and the pull request can be viewed on GitHub. Wladimir, a member of the bitcoin community, praised the work, stating that he has already been reading it and hasn't found any technical issues yet. The announcement has also been posted on Bitcointalk for discussion.
